title: After months of tilting and losing I finally broke -100, and here's how :D
body:
I got demoted fro S5 twice... The first time I tilted all the way down to Brnz 2, and then scurried back to Silver 5, then got demoted AGAIN to Bronznoob.

I was like... Something's gotta give.... So I changed up my entire attitude. Instead of casually working alongside my team mates, I started rallying them.

So... rallying team mates... What do I mean by that? I mean like, if your thresh goes 0/3 by the first 10 minutes, I just say "THRESH GO SUCK A FKING DICK U PHEGGT SCUM WEABOO! GO KILLYOURSELF U JUSTIN BIBER BABY SATINIST CHRISTIAN!" And Sure enough, thresh actually went to go suck Madlife's dick. Madlife then hopped on his computer and won the game 47/3 with his #LCSbigplays

This has been my guide on how 2 get high elos, rate and subscribe thx
